metadata.title: USN-3313-2 -- Linux kernel (HWE) vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-3313-1 fixed vulnerabilities in the Linux kernel for Ubuntu 16.10. This update provides the corresponding updates for the Linux Hardware Enablement (HWE) kernel from Ubuntu 16.10 for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS.  It was discovered that a buffer overflow existed in the trace subsystem in the Linux kernel. A privileged local attacker could use this to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3313-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-image-4.8.0-54-generic - 4.8.0-54.57~16.04.1 linux-image-extra-4.8.0-54-generic - 4.8.0-54.57~16.04.1 linux-image-4.8.0-54-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-54.57~16.04.1 linux-image-4.8.0-54-lowlatency - 4.8.0-54.57~16.04.1 No subscription required
